Post_Title: My parents scented my masks to make it uncomfortable for me to wear one...
post_text:
My parents are anti maskers... And they hate the fact that I wear masks everywhere all the time...

They've tried many tricks to prevent me from wearing masks and most of the time it hasn't worked...

We've had countless nights fighting over this and my parents always end with "I wish we had a faithful child who wouldn't argue with us about what's right n what's wrong"

This time they pulled a new trick...

I have a massive allergy to a lot of deoderants and perfumes... And also many scents of flowers and essential oils (you probably know where I'm going with this) they cause me to have continuous sneezing, headaches, nausea, dizziness, stomach ache, a hard time breathing, and I've even slipped/fallen from the dizziness it causes me...

My parents scented all 3 of my masks that I have (I generally wash em after using em once so I need 3 because it takes time for them to dry up) right before we were about to leave the house for a "new years party" which I was forced to go to...

I realised that they did so, and I was really angry at first but couldn't do much... I had to keep my mask up in the uber for the whole ride and it started giving me a massive headache, the specific smells I noticed were naphthalene, and jasmine which irritate me the most...

I tried keeping my mask on for the whole time but it was really tough for me to do so...

Because of the smell I had to take multiple trips to the washroom to throw up, I couldn't stand properly and it felt like hell...

My parents reaction to this you ask? They did nothing, just looked at me and laughed... "So how's the mask going on for you? The mask seems to be affecting you right now, why don't you take it off?", "poor kid has breathing problems it seems... Only if he wasn't wearing a mask"...

I'm sick now cuz of this and can't get very far out of bed because of my stomach ache... It goes away for a few minutes and comes back to annoy the fuck out of me...

Threads.Reply_Text: Your parents literally poisoned you. You could actually report them for knowingly and purposefully subjecting you to something that makes you extremely sick.

Replies.Reply_Text: I don't have proper evidence of them doing so... They washed the masks so I can't even show that they were tampered to begin with...
